ego_vehicle_speed.description: Set a target speed of the autonomous vehicle

ego_vehicle_acceleration.description: Control the acceleration of the vehicle

ego_vehicle_deceleration.description: Control the deceleration of the vehicle

left_lane_change.description: Make a lane change behavior to the left adjacent lane

right_lane_change.description: Make a lane change behavior to the right adjacent lane

recalculate_route.description: Cancel the planned route and calculate a new route based on new situations

manual_drive.description: Disable the controller to allow manual driving
